alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 7:05PM CDT until May 05 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT/645 PM MDT/. * At 704 PM CDT/604 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Champion, or 13 miles southwest of Imperial, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Imperial, Wauneta, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Center Dam Campground, Area A Campground and Church Grove Campground. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
